turns.text: uh-huh uh we have not camped in any of those places in fact it has been number of years since we have camped but we used to go to Tyler State Park and uh Daingerfield and in Texas that is where we camp basically Uh
turns.label: b

turns.text: They are very nice Tyler is really really neat place to camp It has nice little lake and it has some really wonderful uh sights that are in the wooded areas Uh the facilities are quite nice and our children liked liked it quite well Uh the kids are well they are quite bit younger than - should be then and you know they - we felt real safe with their being able to do what they would like to do there in the area And uh it was just it was just really nice place to camp
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Uh now Daingerfield is - lets see I think thats little bit mor- more east further east and and maybe south if I am remembering where that is No I think its little bit further north when I think about it At any rate it was it was very nice as well But Tyler we sort of got spoiled with I think

But uh we had lived in Michigan before we came here and uh had done lot of camping in Michigan I think the upper peninsula of Michigan especially - and then also we had done some camping in Colorado in the mountains so uh my parents were real avid campers and my husbands parents were really avid campers as well So I guess we just kind of came by it naturally
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Do you have large tent or -
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Well there well supposedly - they always say it sleeps more than it does

Well sort of early on especially as our children got little bit bigger uh we invested in some stacking uh cots you know that were like bunk bunk beds but they were cots fold up cots That really gave us lot more space um floor space and so you did not have to be constantly getting things off the floor in order to walk around and -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh gave us place to stack things during the day so that was real nice But uh we uh - like my in-laws also had camper or uh pop up tent you know one of those trailer tops and those are really nice too little more uh luxurious so to speak but not much
turns.label: sd
